page.shortlink: api star html to plain function
page.description: Convert from html to plain text.
page.discussion: The *HTML_TO_PLAIN() function converts HTML text to its equivalent un-encoded ASCII text.
page.example: dim html_text as C dim plain_text as C html_text = file.to_string("c:\rtf_test.htm") html_text = extract_string(html_text, "< body", "< /body>") html_text = right(html_text, len(html_text)-1) ? html_text = George lived on top of a mountain. plain_text = *html_to_plain(html_text) ? plain_text = "George lived on top of a mountain. "
